p: Reproductive characteristics of M. micrantha [ 37, 38] were calculated in each plot with the following parameters: (1) Reproductive allocation (g·g −1) = inflorescence biomass/total biomass of each plant, (2) Reproductive investment (g·g −1) = flower biomass/total biomass of each plant, (3) Reproductive index (g·g −1) = flower biomass/inflorescence biomass of each plant, (4) Reproductive ratio (flower·mg −1) = flower number/inflorescence biomass of each plant and (5) Reproductive efficiency index (flower·mg −1) = flower number/total biomass of each plant.
